title: New: FINNEAS â€“ Break My Heart Again
content:
When not producing and writing with his soon-to-be-biggest-popstar-in-the-world sister, Billie Eilish, FINNEAS also releases his own music.

Showcasing a more sombre side to his writing sensibilities, this latest track from him is absolutely stunning. Like a more modern inspired version of Tobias Jesso Jr., Break My Heart Again is real heart on sleeves stuff, damningly honest and searingly relatable, it manages to toe the fine line between cheesy and sentimental, with brilliant results. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
